Articles.Content:
Welcome to the Kerbol Wilds.

This is gonna be a mod influenced by the now-released game Outer Wilds.

Planets will be at the scale of 2x Outer Wilds' system(still meters across) and will not be EXACT copies, they'll be INSPIRED by the game.

Planets will be listed here:

Spoiler

Kerbol- same as normal, except maybe 5 km across?

Ferro Twins(Magna and Oppo)- Bound to each other by magnetic forces, they are mostly made of iron. Magna has high levels of ferrofluid seas, which were once on Oppo which is now drained with alien structures revealed. ~100 m each, each orbit 500 m from barycenter. Barycenter orbits 5 km from Sun.

Fireside Forest- Kerbin-size and Kerbin-like object, 3 large craters. KSC located in biggest, ruins in smaller ones. ~500 m size, 9 km orbit.

Battlestone- Small Gilly-size spherical object with large crater with ruins in it. Smaller craters and trees are located on it as well. 180 m in size. ~900 m orbit around Fireside.

Frail Hollow- 'Hollow' Duna-size object, high-up polar ice caps and cracks in ground. Ground is grey covered in alien structures dotted around. 600 m size.  14 km orbit.

Brittle's Smelter- Small asteroid object, covered in lava with large volcanoes jutting out. ~50 m size, maybe 100 m orbit around Frail

Fathomless- Giant world covered in water with small islands. ~2500 m size, 19 km orbit.

Inconstansa- Grey cloudy moon, completely flat and grassy, only surface feature is a house and a couple of trees around it at the north pole. ~190 m size, 1000 m orbit around Fathomless.

Night Briar- Large world, covered in dark vines. Rest is the lowest points on the heightmap, just black. ~1300 m size, 26 km orbit.

The Encroacher- Small comet with spikes all over, only flat land is on back, with a crack in it. ~100 m size. Orbit eccentric, furthest point ~40 km closest ~600m.

Stay tuned for more!

Edited June 3, 2019 by Noah the Smol
distances and sizes adjusted
How many mods are you working on my guy!
